topics.body:
Random thought:
Why is mythology so weird some times?

For example what about rice would cause a vampire to have to count every single one? . . .
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20060205225316/muppet/images/3/3c/CT-p0001-ST.jpg!
. . . Okay, bad example, but still a lot of mythology is weird and I love it for being so weird most of the time.
